short.ar: Arvin ChatGPT امتداد لجميع المواقع. كاتب AI للإيميل وتويتر ولينكدين وملخصات للمدونات واليوتيوب.
short.am: አርቪን ChatGPT ለኢሜል፣ Twitter፣ LinkedIn፣ ብሎግ እና ዮትዩብ ማጠቃለያ ፕሮግራሞች ይጠቀማል።
short.bg: Arvin ChatGPT razširitev za spletne strani. AI pisatelj za e-pošto, družbena omrežja in spletne vsebine.
short.bn: Arvin ChatGPT: সাইটে ব্যবহারযোগ্য AI লেখক। ইমেল, সোশ্যাল মিডিয়া এবং ব্লগের জন্য উপযুক্ত।
short.ca: Extensió Arvin ChatGPT per a tots els webs. Amb IA per escriure correus, Twitter, LinkedIn i resumir blocs i YouTube.
short.cs: Arvin ChatGPT: Rozšíření pro všechny weby. AI asistent pro e-maily, sociální média a shrnutí blogů.
short.da: Arvin ChatGPT-udvidelse til alle hjemmesider. AI-forfatter til e-mail, sociale medier og indholdsoversigt.
short.de: Arvin ChatGPT-Erweiterung für alle Websites. KI-Autor für E-Mail, Social Media und Zusammenfassungen.
short.el: Η επέκταση Arvin ChatGPT λειτουργεί παντού. Με AI συγγραφέα για email, Twitter, LinkedIn και συνόψεις.

short.en_GB: Arvin ChatGPT extension for any site. AI writer for Email, Twitter, LinkedIn & summarizer for Blog, Youtube.
short.en_US: Arvin ChatGPT extension for any site. AI writer for emails & social media. Blog & YouTube summarizer.
short.es: Extensión Arvin ChatGPT para cualquier web. IA para emails, redes sociales y resúmenes de blog y YouTube.
short.es_419: Extensión Arvin ChatGPT para cualquier web. IA para redacción de emails, redes sociales y resúmenes.
short.et: Arvin ChatGPT laiendus veebisaitidele. AI-kirjutaja e-kirja, sotsiaalmeedia jaoks ja kokkuvõtja blogidele.
short.fa: Arvin ChatGPT: افزونه قدرتمند برای استفاده در هر وب سایت. با نویسنده هوش مصنوعی برای ایمیل، توییتر، لینکدین و خلاصه سازی.
short.fi: Arvin ChatGPT: AI-työkalu verkossa. Kirjoittaa sähköpostit ja some-julkaisut, tiivistää blogit ja videot.
short.fil: Arvin ChatGPT: Verkko-AI-työkalu. Kirjoittaa sähköpostit ja some-julkaisut, tiivistää sisältöä.
short.fr: Extension Arvin ChatGPT pour tous sites web. Rédacteur IA pour e-mails, réseaux sociaux et résumés de contenu.
short.gu: Arvin ChatGPT કોઈપણ વેબસાઇટ પર વપરાય છે. ઇમેલ, સોશિયલ મીડિયા માટે AI લેખક અને બ્લોગ સંક્ષેપકો સાથે.
short.he: Arvin ChatGPT: הרחבה לכל אתר עם כותב AI לאימייל, טוויטר ולינקדאין, וסיכום לבלוג ויוטיוב.
short.hi: आर्विन चैटजीपीटी विस्तार: किसी भी वेबसाइट पर उपयोग करें। ईमेल, सोशल मीडिया के लिए एआई लेखक और संक्षेपक शामिल।
short.hr: Arvin ChatGPT proširenje za sve web stranice. AI pisac za e-poštu, društvene mreže i sažetke sadržaja.
short.hu: Arvin ChatGPT kiterjesztés minden weboldalhoz. AI író e-mailekhez, közösségi médiához és tartalomösszefoglalókhoz.

short.ja: Arvin ChatGPTはウェブ拡張機能で、AIライターと要約器を備えています。メール、SNS、ブログ、動画に対応。
short.kn: Arvin ChatGPT ವಿಸ್ತರಣೆ: ವೆಬ್‌ಸೈಟ್‌ಗಳಿಗೆ ಬಳಸಬಹುದು. ಇಮೇಲ್, ಸಾಮಾಜಿಕ ಮಾಧ್ಯಮ ಮತ್ತು ಬ್ಲಾಗ್‌ಗಳಿಗೆ ವಿಷಯ ರಚನೆ.
short.ko: Arvin ChatGPT: 모든 웹사이트용 확장 기능. 이메일, SNS용 AI 작가, 블로그/YouTube 요약기 포함.

short.lv: Arvina ChatGPT paplašinājums lietošanai tīmeklī. AI rakstnieks e-pastiem, sociālajiem tīkliem un kopsavilkumiem.

short.mr: आर्विन चॅटजीपीटी वेबसाइट सज्जीकरणासाठी उपकरण. ईमेल, सोशल मीडिया आणि ब्लॉगसाठी AI लेखक व संक्षेपिका.
short.ms: Arvin ChatGPT untuk laman web & penulis AI Emel, Twitter, LinkedIn serta ringkasan Blog & Youtube.

short.no: Arvin ChatGPT-utvidelse for alle nettsider. AI-forfatter for e-post, sosiale medier og innholdssammendrag.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie Arvin ChatGPT do użycia na stronach. AI pisarz do e-maili, social media i skracacz treści.
short.pt_BR: Extensão Arvin ChatGPT para qualquer site, com AI para E-mails, Twitter, LinkedIn e resumos para Blogs e Youtube.
short.pt_PT: Extensão Arvin ChatGPT: use em qualquer site. IA para E-mail, Twitter, LinkedIn e resumos de Blogs/Youtube.
short.ro: Extensie Arvin ChatGPT pentru orice site. Scriitor AI pentru e-mail, social media și rezumate pentru blog-uri.
short.ru: Расширение Arvin ChatGPT для любого сайта. AI для email, Twitter, LinkedIn, блогов и YouTube.
short.sk: Arvin ChatGPT rozšírenie pre všetky weby. AI spisovateľ pre e-maily, sociálne médiá a súhrny pre blogy a YouTube.
short.sl: Arvin ChatGPT razširitev za vse spletne strani. AI pisatelj za e-pošto, družbena omrežja in povzetki.

short.sw: Upanuzi wa Arvin ChatGPT kwa wavuti zote. Mwandishi wa AI kwa Barua pepe, mitandao ya kijamii na muhtasari.
short.ta: ஆர்வின் சாட்ஜிபிடி விரிவு பல வலைதளங்களுக்கு பயனுள்ளது. மின்னஞ்சல், ட்விட்டர், லிங்க்டைன், வலைப்பதிவு, யூடியூப் சுருக்கம் உட்பட.
short.te: అర్విన్ చాట్జిపీటీ పొరకుగా వెబ్సైట్. ఈమెయిల్, ట్విట్టర్, లింకెడిన్ AI రచయిత. బ్లాగ్ & యూట్యూబ్ సార్స నిఘంటువు.
short.th: Arvin ChatGPT ส่วนขยายใช้ได้ทุกเว็บ มี AI เขียนอีเมล โซเชียล และสรุปบล็อก/ยูทูป
short.tr: Arvin: Her sitede ChatGPT uzantısı. E-posta ve sosyal medya için AI yazar ve özetleyici.
short.uk: Розширення Arvin ChatGPT для будь-якого веб-сайту. AI-письменник для пошти, соцмереж та створення сводок.
short.vi: Arvin ChatGPT: Tiện ích mở rộng đa năng. Hỗ trợ AI cho Email, Twitter, LinkedIn, Blog và Youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Arvin introduces a revolutionary new UI that allows you to use OpenAI’s ChatGPT on all your favorite sites such as Google Search, Gmail, LinkedIn, Github, and more. With this UI, you can search and write online with ease!

Here’s how it works:
- Simply Click ⌥ /alt + A to use OpenAI GPT on any website
- Chat with Arvin, your AI assistant that's always improving
- Why not type a slash “/” and see what happens?

1. With Arvin, you can easily write professional email replies. 

All you have to do is provide a prompt that describes the context of the email and the kind of response you're looking for. Arvin will then analyze your prompt and suggest words and phrases that fit with the desired tone and content.

2. Arvin can summarize your content on any website.

Just give it the full text of your content and it will generate a summary that reflects the main points and key details. Arvin will analyze the text and come up with a summary that captures the essence of the content.

3. ‘New way’ to use ChatGPT, Slash Commands.

We are working on making usage easier and safer.  Previously, users had to communicate with ChatGPT by sending a message for it to perform an action.  Now, the new approach involves typing a slash symbol "/" to access a menu of available prompts within the server. We love using them, and we know you who are using them already do, too!

4.  What’s New : Chat with Arvin

Arvin is now equipped to have a friendly chat with you, just like a real human. You can ask him any question, tell him your problems, or just chat about your day. What's more, Arvin is constantly learning from your conversations to optimize his answers and responses. You can help him get smarter and more human-like by chatting with him regularly. With this new feature, Arvin is not just a chatbot anymore; he's your virtual friend that you can talk to whenever you need someone to listen. So why not give Arvin a try and experience the joy of chatting with an AI chatbot that's always learning and improving? Start chatting with Arvin today and see how he can enhance your day-to-day conversations.

5. Save & Reuse Prompts

Arvin doesn't just summarize your content, it also provides a convenient function to save prompts and suggested prompts.  This feature allows users to easily save and reuse frequently used prompts, as well as suggested prompts, streamlining their content creation process and enhancing efficiency.

Website: tryarvin.com

-What is chatgpt?

ChatGPT is an advanced language model developed by OpenAI based on the GPT (Generative Pre-Training Transformer) architecture. It is trained on a massive amount of text data from the web, and so is able to understand and respond to user input in a conversational manner. This makes it a great choice for use in chatbot and virtual assistant applications, and it can be used for a variety of natural language processing tasks such as language translation, text summarization, text generation, and answering questions.

-Troubleshooting

If you have any difficulties reach out to developer@idealabs.mobi
long.en,en_AU,zh_CN,zh_TW:
Arvin introduces a revolutionary new UI that allows you to use OpenAI's ChatGPT on all your favorite sites such as Google Search, Gmail, LinkedIn, Github, and more. With this UI, you can search and write online with ease! 😄

Arvin keeps improving to bring you an exceptional experience. 🚀 By continuously optimizing the code interpreter, Arvin enables seamless debugging and rapid prototyping. ⚡️ Furthermore, using the web summarizer feature, you can easily summarize page content. 📝 What's more, get intelligent responses based on any uploaded PDFs. 📄 Additionally, Arvin enhances web access for your maximum convenience. 🌐

Here's how it works:
Simply Click ⌥ /alt + A to use OpenAI GPT on any website 💡
Chat with Arvin, your AI assistant who's always improving 💪

1. With Arvin, you can easily write professional email replies. 📧
All you have to do is provide a prompt describing the email's context and the kind of response you're looking for. Arvin will then analyze your prompt and suggest words and phrases that fit with the desired tone and content. 👍

2. Arvin can summarize your content on any website. 📝
Just give it the full text of your content and it will generate a summary that reflects the main points and key details. Arvin will analyze the text and come up with a summary that captures the essence of the content.🔎

3. Quick Actions let you instantly translate, paraphrase, or explain text selections. ⚡️
With Arvin's Quick Actions, you can select any text on a webpage and instantly get AI-powered translations, paraphrasing, or explanations. This allows you to quickly grasp concepts, rewrite the text, and bridge language barriers right on the spot. Just highlight what you want to understand better and let Arvin work its magic!💻

4. AI painter will unleash your inner artist with just a few clicks.🧑‍🎨
Discover a new world of creative possibilities as you effortlessly generate stunning visual art. Whether you're a pro, amateur, or complete beginner, AI Painter makes artistic expression accessible to all. Join the creative revolution today and see your imagination brought to life! With AI Painter, the only limit is your imagination.🎨

5. AI Bot provides advanced conversational capabilities. 🤖
Arvin features a sophisticated AI Bot that feels like a real conversation. It has advanced natural language capabilities trained on massive datasets, allowing for human-like interactions. Discuss any topic with Arvin's AI Bot to experience seamless chatbot engagement.🧠

6. Web Summarizer condenses articles into concise overviews. 📰
Arvin's Web Summarizer is a game-changer for processing online information. Instead of having to read full articles, simply use the summarizer to get concise overviews highlighting key points. It condenses content down to essential excerpts, allowing you to consume web pages efficiently. Stay informed without getting overwhelmed!📶

7. Chat with PDF allows conversing about PDF content. 📄
Struggling to extract information from PDFs? Arvin lets you have natural conversations about any PDF content. Whether it's an academic paper, report, or manual, you can ask Arvin questions just as you would chat with a person knowledgeable about the document. It opens up PDFs for easy discovery.📖

8. Web Access enables comprehension of real-time web info. 🌐
Arvin grants AI comprehension of the web in real-time. It can contextualize and explain pages as you browse, just as a human would learn from online information. Web Access allows Arvin to chat about current events, trending topics, and more. Stay updated effortlessly!🌍

9. Code Interpreter helps understand and explain code. 👨‍💻
For programmers, Arvin's Code Interpreter bridges communication gaps with AI. It can interpret snippets of code and explain them in simple terms, helping to clarify complex logic and functions. Get lucid descriptions of any codebase with this invaluable assistant.🎓

10. Chat with Arvin 💬
Arvin is now equipped to have a friendly chat with you, just like a real human. You can ask him any question, tell him your problems, or just chat about your day. What's more, Arvin is constantly learning from your conversations to optimize his answers and responses. You can help him get smarter and more human-like by chatting with him regularly. With this new feature, Arvin is not just a chatbot anymore; he's your virtual friend that you can talk to whenever you need someone to listen to. So why not give Arvin a try and experience the joy of chatting with an AI chatbot that's always learning and improving? Start chatting with Arvin today and see how he can enhance your day-to-day conversations. 🤝

11. Save & Reuse Prompts 💾
Arvin doesn't just summarize your content, it also provides a convenient function to save prompts and suggested prompts. This feature allows users to easily save and reuse frequently used prompts and suggested prompts, streamlining their content creation process and enhancing efficiency. ✅

If you have any difficulties reach out to contact.arvin@idealabs.mobi 📞
